review: 暴雪我草你妈，补给系统呢？怎么他妈英雄需要解锁。没法继承国服的数据，我玩你妈。
暴雪死妈，反正上线steam也救不了它。本来都是全身都在棺材里，露出个头在外面呼吸的游戏了。我有那钱买豪华版游戏不如拿这个钱冲原神，我有这个时间去打箱子开皮肤我不如去给三国杀刷好评。不过这里还是说一句 祝愿后期入坑没花钱没花时间的玩家玩的愉快。反正这游戏你们也不会玩太久，毕竟是暴雪的游戏不论开局怎么样最后都会变成依托狗屎。

给差评送新英雄

I've played this game since release on Battle.net. I've spent hundreds of hours in it and I can never forgive the developers for what they did to my favourite game.

This used to be the most addictive, fun and rewarding games. The developers then decided that turning it all on it's head is a great idea. They promised us a sequel for no apparent reason. In the original game worth 15-60 euro depending on when you bought it. For this single purchase the entirety of the game was available to you. No Battle Pass, no 20 euro skins. After the release of 2 the game wen't "free" to play, but without buying the battle pass or spending 20 euro (1/3 of the full games price) on a skin you are stuck without any cosmetics so there is nothing to keep you going.

The main reason for the release of this "sequel" is that it would include the LOOONG promised PvE campaign COMPLETELY free. A few months after it's release the developer's informed us that there would be no PvE campaign but only small PvE missions (as the original game was getting through events) only for the small fee of 15 euro.

There were many other changes. Some good, some bad but in the grand scheme many things were left broken or lacking compared to the original release. I can only ask of you to never give money to these vultures.

我下载游戏，玩了6分钟。目的就是为了给这个游戏一个差评。

但是在这6分钟里暴雪再次给我震撼，进入游戏英雄居然还需要解锁？

在2016年的夏天，当时熊猫TV还在。我们众多主播都发了疯一样的迷恋上了守望先锋这款游戏。

那时候进入游戏你就可以选择任意你想玩的英雄，而不需要做任务解锁更加没有战令这种东西。

但是我们会为了自己喜欢的英雄不停提升，给自己喜欢的英雄带上金皮。

但是现在这款游戏不再也不值得了。不值得的不是游戏。而是让这款游戏变得糟糕的暴雪。

当暴雪离开把所有国服玩家的数据清空，我们的对这款游戏的热爱和付出就已经被否定。

这个世界再也没有英雄了。

当暴雪再次想起中国市场，给这款游戏上STEAM，出简体中文。也没用任何意义。

如果身边还有朋友玩这款游戏，所有人都会笑话他。

最后附上如何在库中吧这款游戏移除的方法。

如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

时至今日，2018~2023，见过、玩过许多游戏，守望先锋依然是我最喜欢 游戏时间最长的游戏，
令人感慨，从拿下2016TGA和cg火出圈风光无限好到如今一片唱衰刷差评如潮，
毋庸置疑，守望先锋本身是一款极其优秀的游戏。
见证了成都猎人队龟壳整容一战成名到如今退出owl，
见证b站大手笔买入owl转播权到如今owl面临结束，
见证守望断档式的大主播pva的盛衰，
见证303到222，6v6到5v5，
被脑残平衡气的砸桌子，
大骂考迪克秦妈爆炸，
但同样的，
这b游戏也见证了我为数不多和5 6 好友欢声笑语的夜晚，
见证了我的中学时期。
如果你问我，守望先锋1花328买值吗，我会毫不犹豫的说值得。
但是如果你问我，话260买守望先锋2战令值吗，客观上说，他一点都不值得，
但我仍然忍不住想买，
借用游戏里的一句话：
“这个世界需要守望先锋吗，不需要”，
但是，我需要。

tldr: Don't waste your time, just play Deep Rock Galactic.

Overwatch 2 is a disappointment beyond measure. Leading up to its "release" last year, Blizzard acted like a toxic ex, gaslighting you into getting back together. They promised that they changed and developed as a person and just wanted to start over from the beginning. Since then they only continued with they're destructive habits, going "free to play" but doubling down on their predatory monetization and using emotional manipulation to seek forgiveness from their players. 

After the announcement that they were canceling the full, standalone pve experience that meant to justify the "2" in Overwatch 2, they decided the best way to soften the blow was to tack on watered down pve missions into their premium shop while mainly still focusing on the pvp side of the game. This was the breaking point. After learning what had been the main selling point for the sequel, and the reason many had held on through the dark times would never actually come to fruition, many left the game for good, including myself. Blizzard squandered the good faith of their players, not once but twice catastrophically in essentially the same game. The fact that they think they can expect any chance of redemption at this point is laughable.

For anyone who is thinking about trying Overwatch 2 now that its on Gaben's store, or even lapsed players who feel the urge to return, I highly recommend you reconsider. Don't waste your energy and mental health feeding yourself into a game that doesn't respect you, your time, or your intelligence. Instead, play games that actually deliver on what they promise and don't treat you like a walking bank account. 

One game I can recommend is Deep Rock Galactic. A pve team shooter similar in ways to Left 4 Dead, but has multiple classes and deep customization within those classes, allowing for a variety of play styles. There are no waifus in catsuits, however you get to be badass dwarves shooting, burning, freezing, drilling and blowing up bugs in space. The developers also consistently update there game with seasonal events and even a "battlepass" which is just a track of cosmetic rewards for the players to grind for completely for free. All of this is contained in an addictive game play loop that is thoroughly enjoyable even after hundreds of hours of playtime.

Back to Overwatch... 2. Its a shame that a game that was so revered and influential to the gaming landscape has been reduced to such a sorry, hollow state, all due to the the black hole of greed that is current Blizzard. It'd be nice to see Overwatch bounce back and reclaim the "glory" it once had, however I personally feel the "honor" had been buried long ago.

With arrival of OW2, we:
- lost the game we paid for (OW 1)
- went from awesome 6v6 where tanks were fun to play to 5v5 where tanks are just stupidly beefy, just because streamers are alergic to teamwork and want to be circle-jerked by their stupid fans (this is the worst change as the game no longer feels fun)
- no longer have new heroes automatically unlocked for everyone
- lost lootboxes (which were the most fair in the business) with grindy BP
- lost 2CP for a shitty Push mode
- got a worse scoreboard
- lost "I am on fire" indicator/animation
- got shittier version of winning theme
- shitty "modern" UI
- lost Papa Jeff :(

FU Blizzard, shame Microsoft bailed you out

我怀念的，是曾经一起开黑的老朋友，是通过守望先锋认识的新朋友，是看到新cg时的惊喜，是隐藏在游戏中的精妙的剧情设计，是打出精彩操作时的激动，是练习秒刀瞬转的日日夜夜，是一起在弹幕打出满屏“我收到了召唤，我必须回应，一如既往”的感动，是曾经的破坏球天花板，是”来自首尔的纸老虎是打不赢成都的真熊猫的“，是“we are ready to let the world see China again”

Approximately 40-60 hours played on the original Battle .net release.

I would not recommend on any level.  There is nothing salvageable here.

The developers have recanted on virtually all their launch promises, a "future promise" that will now never happen, and their release on Steam is a vapid attempt recover their dying player base.

Fortunately Steam is a much better platform, and user reviews are placed front and center of every game.

Unfortunately, by releasing the game for free on Steam and walling off content in the form of DLC, Blizzard is defending itself against potential refunds by dissatisfied customers.

Exercise extra caution if you decide to buy any of the content.

《鬥陣特攻 2》是一款免費遊玩的射擊遊戲，坐擁超過 30 位英雄，每一位都擁有扭轉戰局的能力。
選擇你的英雄並與好友組隊，在這款終極的團隊射擊遊戲中，征戰全新地圖與模式。
《鬥陣特攻 2》是一款免費遊戲，在遊戲世界裡戰鬥持續不斷，且玩家體驗將持續進化。
跟好友並肩作戰，不受遊戲平台的限制，暢享打破傳統的 PvP 戰鬥體驗。
更多強大英雄將在未來加入遊戲現有的英雄陣容。
不論你是喜歡帶頭衝鋒陷陣、埋伏並偷襲敵人，還是協助隊伍盟友，你都能在此找到適合你的新英雄。
扮演新英雄，組成隊伍陣容並展開緊張刺激的戰鬥、探索更多地圖，以及 5v5 對戰。
在對戰中，每個玩家都擁有扭轉戰局的能力。
在多個平台和不同裝置上體驗遊戲，不管在哪裡玩，所有遊戲物品、遊戲進度和成就都能共享。
